summary:
Didn\'t your Mama tell you not to hit women?
This mod simply changes all the female bandits in game to male.
descriptionHtml:
v2 - Fixed Female voices with male bodies, aka \"transvestite voice bug\"

While playing Skyrim, it has always made me slightly, vaguely uncomfortable after killing a female bandit. While actually fighting for my life, I rarely thought of it. 
Last night, while watching Gamespot\'s \"top 5 mods\" videos, I opened up the CK for the first time and made this mod. It took maybe 15 minutes. 
Is it for everyone? No. 
Is the whole concept of Chivalry somewhat sexist? Just ask a Feminist: Of course it is. 
But if the mod makes someone else less morally uncomfortable while playing than it is a worthwhile 15 minutes spent. 
If I decide to continue, I will do the same for the Forsworn. 
Why? Because you cannot decide not to fight either of those factions. 
If you join the Dark Brotherhood you are making a conscious decision to kill anyone, etc 

If I do Chivalry Forsworn, I may follow up with a Misogyny set of mods, that make all the automatically hostile factions female. And I would make it modular, so you can have all female Forsworn and all male Bandits. Might work on Vamps at that point. 

While making different regions all female and all male is technically possible, it would not be compatible with this mod, and would NOT be a 15 minute project. 

Also, I am male, I am happily married, and my wife laughed when I told her about the mod. Take it as you will.

<original description below>
If killing all those women has ever made you uncomfortable, this is for you.
First version changes just the Bandits to males, later versions may work on other factions, such as the Forsworn.
Changes no named NPC\'s, just the run-of-the-mill bandits.
Also available on the workshop. Not an April Fools joke, and also not intending not intending to start a comment thread flame war.
author: Ebeneezersquid
